channel.title: Gibberellin on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Gibberellin on COTTON

item.title: GhMKK4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMKK4 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton MAPK kinase GhMPK20 negatively regulates resistance to Fusarium oxysporum by mediating the MKK4–MPK20–WRKY40 cascade.
